scenario.name: oa_exchange
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$remote_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [service] <sip:[service]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[call_number][local_port] To: [$remote_number] <sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_domain]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- [$session_id] [$session_vrs] IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Test1 t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK sip:[$remote_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$remote_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- [$session_id] [$session_vrs] IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Test2 t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 m=video [auto_media_port+4] RTP/AVP 34 b=AS:99910 a=rtpmap:34 H263/90000 a=fmtp:34 CIF=1; QCIF=1;

ACK sip:[$remote_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$remote_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- [$session_id] [$session_vrs] IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Test3 t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio 0 RTP/AVP 8 m=video 0 RTP/AVP 34 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

v=0 o=- [$session_id] [$session_vrs] IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Test4 t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio 0 RTP/AVP 8 m=video 0 RTP/AVP 34 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 8 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

v=0 o=- [$session_id] [$session_vrs] IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Test5 t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio 0 RTP/AVP 8 m=video 0 RTP/AVP 34 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 18 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000

ACK sip:[$remote_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

v=0 o=- [$session_id] [$session_vrs] IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Test6 t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio 0 RTP/AVP 8 m=video 0 RTP/AVP 34 m=image [media_port] udptl t38 a=T38FaxVersion:0 a=T38MaxBitRate:14400 a=T38FaxRateManagement:transferredTCF a=T38FaxMaxBuffer:200 a=T38FaxMaxDatagram:200 a=T38FaxUdpEC:t38UDPRedundancy

v=0 o=- [$session_id] [$session_vrs] IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Return to audio t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio 0 RTP/AVP 8 m=video 0 RTP/AVP 34 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 8 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK sip:[$remote_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[$remote_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$remote_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$remote_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [service] <sip:[service]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[call_number][local_port] To: "[$remote_number]" <sip:[$remote_number]@[$remote_domain]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: [service] <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=udp> [authentication] Max-Forwards: 70 Privacy: none Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- [$session_id] [$session_vrs] IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
